metadata.description: Set in the world of the smash-hit videogame Dishonored!nSet after Dishonored 2, our story see Emily Kaldwin return to Dunwall fro an adventure with Corvano Attano!nEmily comes into conflict with a politician named Archibald Dufrane, and there is a mysterious killer on the loose. But when Emily's powers start to falter in the middle of their investigation, things start to deadly...
metadata.name: Dishonored: Peeress and the Price
